articles.description: PIERS MORGAN, Good Morning Britain host alongside Susanna Reid, has opened up about the tragic ordeal his colleague Kate Garraway is going through with her husband Derek Draper, who was admitted to hospital in March after contracting coronavirus.

articles.author: Adi Tantimedh
articles.title: John Cleese Guilts BBC into Restoring Fawlty Towers to Streamer - Bleeding Cool News
articles.description: The BBC pulled an episode of Fawlty Towers from its streaming service for “racial slurs,” but series creator John Cleese wasn't having that.
articles.content: Earlier this week, the BBC pulled "The Germans", an episode of the classic sitcom Fawlty Towers from its UKTV streaming service for containing "racial slurs".  However, the episode will now be reinst… [+6000 chars]

articles.author: Hayley Anderson
articles.title: I May Destroy You: How do you know if your drink has been spiked? What should you do next? - Express
articles.description: I MAY DESTROY YOU has started on HBO and BBC One sharing one woman's experience of getting her drink spiked and subsequently sexually assaulted. But how do you when your drink has been spiked and what should you do when you realise?
articles.content: I May Destroy You was written by actress Michaela Coel who also stars in the HBO and BBC One drama. The series is inspired by Coel's own experience of when she had her drink spiked while on a night o… [+3463 chars]
